selves the husband was very pessimistic

in this way the wife placed a small ad

it was raining very hard
and most intersections were flooded she
was about a mile from her home when she
stopped at a stop sign a truck came
toward her from the opposite direction
went through the intersection spraying a
great deal of water she drove past the
engine of the woman's car died and was
able to start it again she removed her
shoes before stepping out of the car
as the water was more than ankle deep
she raised the hood and began to dry off
the distributor cap with her
handkerchief she was crying at this
point and her tears mingled with the
rain she finally got her car started and
managed to get home to her children she
realized that it was necessary to have a
dependable car if she was to work and
support her children she had no money
for down payment on a newer car and she
did not earn enough to make car payments
she went to work the following Monday
and a co-worker asked her to go to lunch
the co-worker had just purchased a new
Pontiac Tempest and insisted that mrs.

although mrs. CD protested that she did

she captured the feeling that this was
her car and she felt the thrill of

old car mrs. CD imagined that she was
driving a brand new car on the next
Friday her ex-husband called and asked

was the first time since her divorce
several months earlier that he had

obtain through her use of imagination
what she could never have attained
through her own efforts at that time
her ex-husband who had offered her no
monetary support for months was the
Avenue chosen to provide her with a car

who had a desire to live near the ocean

mrs. EF told two of her friends about

that she would imagine visiting her at
the beach at her new home
one week later mrs. EF traveled to

there she received a call from a friend

rental and she thought this house would

this is a very desirable rental and that

likely not available when she returned

the owners that you would take it
trusting her friends recommendation
upon her return from Hawaii she told her

her daughter called her later that day

she gave notice at work and was able to

mrs. EF has since bought a home near the

living at the beach and her friend
imagined that she was visiting her there
they did this for one week it is

imagination was able to draw the
necessary people into her life so that

the Hawaiian outrigger team usually took
first place and were considered
unbeatable ep's team came in seventh and
that was considered quite remarkable
considering the great number of teams
that competed from all over the world
along with the Hawaiian participants
after this race EP became imagining that
his team had won the race he spent the
next year forming a new team practicing
and building his own outrigger canoe he
was convinced that if he imagined
himself winning the race his team would
come in first he next year his team and
at least a dozen others flew to Hawaii
from Southern California to compete in
the annual race there were several teams
with much more experience who were
considered likely to place it in top ten
although the Hawaiians were still
considered the favorite at the end of
the race EPS team finished first ahead
of the Hawaiians and all the other teams
ep now holds a paddle engraved with the
words world champion which was given to
him upon his team taking first place
after winning this coveted tile this
young man went on to coach other teams
he also began manufacturing paddles for
outrigger
canoes his pals are known throughout the

are among the top teams in the world
ep now makes his home in Hawaii enjoys
coaching teams manufacturing paddles
fishing and saying his own boat he also
uses his boat as an escort craft for the
